Description: Rectangular fragment of a copper alloy writing tablet, a votive offering, with demotic inscription on one side, incised and filled in with white paint.
Curator's comments: Published: Stanwick, Portraits of the Ptolemies (2002): 10 Vleeming, Studia Demotica 5, No. 39, pp. 20-31. Guermeur, Les cultes d'Amon hors de Thebes (2006): 357-8, pl.19.
